q: How do Lily and Snape meet for the first time?

q: What is the primary ingredient in Polyjuice potion?
a: The hair of the person you want to transform into

“Fear of a name increases fear of the thing itself” (in the movie)
“Have a biscuit, Potter.”
“Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?”
“I don’t go looking for trouble. Trouble usually finds me.”
“Why spiders? Why couldn’t it be ‘follow the butterflies’?”
“To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.”
“The ones that love us never really leave us. You can always find them, in here.”
“When in doubt, go to the library.”
“Just because you have the emotional range of a teaspoon doesn’t mean we all have.”
“I don’t think you’re a waste of space.”
“Twitchy little ferret, aren’t you, Malfoy?”
“I should have made my meaning plainer. He has achieved high marks in all Defense Against the Dark Arts tests set by a competent teacher.”
“The world isn’t split into good people and Death Eaters.”
“Sunshine, daisies, butter mellow, Turn this stupid, fat rat yellow.”

q: What is the inscription on the fake Horcrux locket found by Dumbledore and Harry in the cave?
a: “To the Dark Lord, I know I will be dead long before you read this but I want you to know that it was I who discovered your secret. I have stolen the real Horcrux and intend to destroy it as soon as I can. I face death in the hope that when you meet your match, you will be mortal once more. R.A.B.”
